description: OpenClaw gateway tool tests. Each prompt should trigger the model to use the named tool; we verify via gateway log.

tools.name: web_fetch / fetch_url
tools.prompt: Fetch the content of https://example.com and reply in one short sentence: what is the page title or main heading? Use the web_fetch or fetch_url tool.

tools.name: browser
tools.prompt: Use the browser tool to open https://example.com. Then tell me in one sentence: what is the title of the page? You must use the browser tool.

tools.name: web_search
tools.prompt: Use the web_search tool to find: what is 2+2? Reply with only the number (e.g. 4).

tools.name: read
tools.prompt: Use the read tool to list or read something from your workspace. If the workspace is empty, reply with 'workspace empty'. Otherwise say what you read.

tools.name: write
tools.prompt: Use the write tool to create a file named openclaw_tooltest_write.txt in your workspace with exactly this content: test write tool. Then reply with the single word: written.

tools.name: exec
tools.prompt: Use the exec tool to run this command: echo hello. Reply with the exact output of the command.

tools.name: session_status
tools.prompt: Call the session_status tool and reply in one line with what it returns (e.g. session id or status).
